data.eml:eml: Notomicrus petrareptans sp. n., a new seep-dwelling species of Noteridae from Suriname (Coleoptera: Adephaga)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baca, Stephen M., Short, Andrew Edward Z. (2018): Notomicrus petrareptans sp. n., a new seep-dwelling species of Noteridae from Suriname (Coleoptera: Adephaga). Zootaxa 4388 (2): 182-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.2.2
